recipes.label: Enemy Adjusting Defensive Strategy
recipes.startdescription: It seems they intend to consolidate their lines.

recipes.label: Enemy Adjusting Defensive Strategy
recipes.startdescription: The Germans are mobilizing heavy firepower support for this defensive line.

recipes.label: Enemy Adjusting Defensive Strategy
recipes.startdescription: The camouflage netting of the armored battalion has been torn away. Engines roar. German scouts must be clearing the path ahead.

recipes.label: Enemy Adjusting Defensive Strategy
recipes.startdescription: The dull thud of shovels biting into frozen earth echoed throughout the night. Trenches spread across the vast plain, forming ever more winding ravines. It seems we will need heavier firepower.

recipes.label: Enemy Adjusting Defensive Strategy
recipes.startdescription: Decorations, shooting deserters, propaganda—the Germans still rely on the same tried-and-true methods. This is why the Empire always has so many fearless madmen.

recipes.startdescription: We've intercepted a German message; they are rallying their troops and reorganizing their units.

recipes.label: Enemy Regrouping
recipes.startdescription: We've intercepted a German message; they are rallying their troops and reorganizing their units.
recipes.description: Gunfire echoes from beyond the trenches. It seems Ilse's private soldiers have grown in number once more—the German military police will have their hands full.

recipes.startdescription: We've intercepted a German message; they are rallying their troops and reorganizing their units.
recipes.description: Their engines ran all night. It seems they've chosen their next batch of suicide squads.

recipes.label: Enemy Regrouping
recipes.startdescription: We've intercepted a German message; they are rallying their troops and reorganizing their units.
recipes.description: At a critical moment like this, they're moving their troops away? There must be something behind this.

recipes.label: Enemy Regrouping
recipes.startdescription: We've intercepted a German message; they are rallying their troops and reorganizing their units.
recipes.description: We've intercepted a German message; they are rallying their troops and reorganizing their units.

recipes.label: Enemy Regrouping
recipes.startdescription: We've intercepted a German message; they are rallying their troops and reorganizing their units.
recipes.description: It seems they've brought in more specialized personnel. Hopefully, they won't cause even greater trouble.

recipes.label: Enemy Regrouping
recipes.startdescription: We've intercepted a German message; they are rallying their troops and reorganizing their units.
recipes.description: They have touched these corpses with the reach of the Void. Now they serve the Germans—regardless of whose allegiance they once belonged to.

recipes.label: Enemy Launching Tactical Assault!
recipes.startdescription: Treads grind through the trenches...
recipes.description: Treads grind through the trenches...

recipes.label: Enemy Launching Tactical Assault!
recipes.startdescription: Treads grind through the trenches...
recipes.description: Treads grind through the trenches...

recipes.label: Enemy Launching Tactical Assault!
recipes.startdescription: ...Combat boots caked with mud.
recipes.description: ...Combat boots caked with mud.

recipes.label: Enemy Launching Tactical Assault!

recipes.label: Enemy Launching Tactical Assault!
recipes.startdescription: The Germans are about to launch a fierce assault on our defensive line. How shall we respond? [Resources committed during this phase will not be consumed. If the assault is not interrupted, the enemy will launch a tactical offensive on two or even multiple fronts. Inviolate Defence or Aid from the Eternal cannot repel this attack from the entire line.]
recipes.description: The Germans are about to launch a fierce assault on our defensive line. How shall we respond? [Resources committed during this phase will not be consumed. If the assault is not interrupted, the enemy will launch a tactical offensive on two or even multiple fronts. Inviolate Defence or Aid from the Eternal cannot repel this attack from the entire line.]

recipes.label: Enemy Movement Detected
recipes.startdescription: We have obtained the coordinates of their troop positions. Our carefully prepared shells will be their answer.
recipes.description: We have obtained the coordinates of their troop positions. Our carefully prepared shells will be their answer.

recipes.label: Enemy Movement Detected
recipes.startdescription: Treads snap, engines stall. It seems the German offensive will fizzle out.
recipes.description: Treads snap, engines stall. It seems the German offensive will fizzle out.

recipes.label: Enemy Forces on the March!
recipes.startdescription: The earth growls. These steel beasts advance slowly, followed by a grey tide.
recipes.description: The earth growls. These steel beasts advance slowly, followed by a grey tide.

recipes.label: Enemy Forces on the March!
recipes.startdescription: The earth growls. These steel beasts advance slowly, followed by a grey tide.
recipes.description: The earth growls. These steel beasts advance slowly, followed by a grey tide.

recipes.label: Enemy Forces on the March!
recipes.startdescription:
Steel extends firepower, flesh scours the field—they advance methodically!

[When this tactic triggers, it will absorb and destroy one non-unique Secondary Objective and exhaust all objectives on the field.]

recipes.label: Successful Counterattack!
recipes.startdescription: Stand and fight.

recipes.label: Successful Counterattack!
recipes.startdescription: Stand and fight.

recipes.label: Successful Counterattack!
recipes.startdescription: Stand and fight.

recipes.label: Successful Counterattack!
recipes.startdescription: Stand and fight.

recipes.label: Lost Resources!
recipes.startdescription: The defensive line has been completely overrun. Supplies lie scattered everywhere. This carefully constructed defensive line has been destroyed in an instant.

recipes.label: Lost Resources!

recipes.label: Enemy Offensive Unstoppable
recipes.startdescription: The Germans triumphantly planted their flag on our position. Our objective has been compromised.
recipes.description: The Germans triumphantly planted their flag on our position. Our objective has been compromised.

recipes.label: I am wounded!
recipes.startdescription: This body is mortal, and the trials of war will see it destroyed if I am careless -

recipes.label: Mark of the Strife
recipes.startdescription: My arch-nemesis was wounded in our Strife.

recipes.label: Mark of the Strife
recipes.startdescription: I was wounded in my Strife against my arch-nemesis.

recipes.label: Infantry-Tank Coordination!
recipes.startdescription: The enemy is approaching—

recipes.label: Infantry-Tank Coordination!
recipes.startdescription: The enemy is approaching—

recipes.label: A Pincer Attack!
recipes.startdescription: Two of our adversaries have decided to strike at the same time - strategy, or sheer ill luck? Either way, we can expect a nasty skirmish ahead.
